history.query:
mutation {
  createPlatform(
    clientLimitReach: false,
    heroStatus: false,
    isBanned: false,
    isOnline: false,
    paymentActive: false,
    userId: "A2QEV02R9xseFHh0bo"
  ) {
    id
    isStuck
    isBanned
    isOnline
    heroActive
    paymentActive
    stuckStage
    clientLimitReach
    heroStatus
    user {id email role}
  }
}

mutation {
  createPlatform(
    clientLimitReach: false,
    heroStatus: false,
    isBanned: false,
    isOnline: false,
    paymentActive: false,
    stuckStage: "Stripe",
    userId: "A2QEV02R9xseFHh0bo"
  ) {
    id
    isStuck
    isBanned
    isOnline
    heroActive
    paymentActive
    stuckStage
    clientLimitReach
    heroStatus
    user {id email role}
  }
}
